mapper.sql: select distinct sys_role.role_id, sys_role.role_name, sys_role.role_key, sys_role.role_sort, sys_role.data_scope, sys_role.status, sys_role.deleted, sys_role.create_time, sys_role.remark from sys_role left join sys_user_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id left join sys_user on sys_user.user_id = sys_user_role.user_id left join sys_dept on sys_user.dept_id = sys_dept.dept_id
